name: Magnet Master (University of Chester Games Development)
name_original: Magnet Master (University of Chester Games Development)
description:
Use magnets to fling the ball through hand-crafted levels! Magnet Master is easy to learn, but hard to master. With 10+ levels, Magnet Master offers a fun, yet challenging experience suitable for all age ranges.

UNIVERSITY OF CHESTER PROJECT DETAILS

Magnet Master was created for a final year game design and implementation module. Students are tasked with designing and creating a mobile game for Android mobile devices. This is a solo project that tests students design, C# + Unity and artistic skills.

CONTROLS

  • Touch controls. Tap the magnets to intere

REQUIREMENTS

  • Android device.

TEAM MEMBERS

  • 1 x Level 6 Student

COURSE DETAILS

The work presented here is that of our students. Although the page is run by the University of Chester, views in the games do not necessarily represent those of the University of Chester.

Information on the BSc Games Development course at University of Chester can be found here.
